Fusion Box.name: Dal Makhni Rice Box
Fusion Box.description: Creamy Dal Makhni with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. The most satisfying meal ever!

Fusion Box.name: Chole Chawal Box
Fusion Box.description: Authentic Amritsari chole with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

Fusion Box.name: Rajma Chawal Box
Fusion Box.description: Really good Rajma served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt. Comfort meal at it's best!

Fusion Box.name: Grilled Tikki Box
Fusion Box.description: Grilled veg patty with a spicy masala curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

Fusion Box.name: Paneer Masala Box
Fusion Box.description: Loads of creamy Paneer with a masaledaar curry; Served with Rice + Salad + Mint chutney + Garlic yogurt

Curries.name: Basmati Rice
Curries.description: Extra-long grain basmati rice steamed with mild & aromatic Desi herbs | Serves 2

Curries.name: Tawa Paratha
Curries.description: Garma-garam soft whole wheat parathas made in Desi ghee

Curries.name: Kadhai Paneer
Curries.description: Soft paneer simmered in masala curry made with freshly ground spices | Serves 2

Curries.name: Raita
Curries.description: Perfect way to complement your feast. Thick masala raita with notes of Cumin & fresh Mint | Serves 1

Curries.name: Butter Chicken
Curries.description: Our version of an indulgent butter chicken curry. It's rich, creamy & NOT sweet. It's the real deal | Serves 2

Biryani.name: Shahi Paneer Biryani
Biryani.description: Extra-long basmati rice cooked with loads of fire-grilled paneer tikkas & whole spices. Burst of flavours in every bite! Served with Raita

Biryani.name: Firangi Subz Biryani
Biryani.description: Baby corn, Mushroom & Paneer cooked in biryani masala & layered over fragrant basmati rice. A mind blowing fusion! Served with Raita

Biryani.name: Chicken Tikka Biryani
Biryani.description: Smoked Chicken-Tikka slow cooked with fragrant basmati rice & whole spices. A truly novel experience! Served with Raita

Biryani.name: Murg Dum Biryani
Biryani.description: Succulent chicken (boneless) layered over aromatic super-long grain rice, slow cooked in quintessential dum style! Served with Raita

Wraps.name: Paneer Wrap
Wraps.description: Tandoor grilled paneer tossed with a Desi style sauce & crunchy veggies. Highly recommended!

Wraps.name: Chicken Wrap
Wraps.description: Classic chicken tikka roll in a whole wheat paratha & tikka sauce. A BOX8 Special!

Wraps.name: Mayo Wrap
Wraps.description: Loaded with Fire Grilled Chicken topped with a generous portion of Mayo & the perfect amount of crunchy veggies.

Wraps.name: Tikki Wrap
Wraps.description: Crispy 'Grilled' veg tikki topped generously with mayo & exotic veggies & wrapped in a whole wheat paratha. Lip smacking!

Wraps.name: Patty Wrap
Wraps.description: Oven Grilled all-veg patty with a flavourful tikka sauce wrapped with fresh veggies! Tantalize your Desi taste-buds!

Ice Cream.name: Tender Coconut
Ice Cream.description: Chunks of fresh tender coconut pieces slow churned into a subtly flavoured creamy wonder. A coastal dream!

Ice Cream.name: Sheer Khurma
Ice Cream.description: The quintessential Ramadan feast now in an ice-cream- A Desi fusion never seen before.
